title: Aromatherapy Associates
description: Shop Aromatherapy Associates at Bluemercury. Explore award-winning therapuetic essential oils and products. Enjoy free samples with every purchase.
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Associates We have been sharing the therapeutic powers of essential oils for over 30 years. Starting out as therapists in the early 1970s, our founders, Geraldine Howard and Sue Beechey, connected with the emerging practice of aromatherapy. We create multi-award-winning pure essential oil blends that bring daily moments of wellness throughout the day to reset your mind, body and skin.
